short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to easily explore the browser.storage content

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to explore the web extension storage (chrome.storage.sync or chrome.storage.local) and also edit or create new values.
Ace editor included for easy json edition.
